content: Diabetes cure a step closer after liver used to regulate blood sugar A diabetes cure is a step closer after scientists discovered a way to regulate blood sugar using the liver. content: Those stem cells are starting to take on the properties of a panacea, or what Ponce de Leon was looking for. Did you notice the gut on that poor diabetes sufferer? To-day diabetes is a disease of affluence. We'll spend billions looking for a 'cure' while chicken pox, measles, polio and host of other diseases - or even basic hunger do infinitely more damage.
